Uses of Class
org.vanted.scaling.scalers.BasicScaler

Packages that use BasicScaler
Package Description
org.vanted.scaling.scalers
High DPI (4K and above) Swing Support: Look and Feel specific scalers.
org.vanted.scaling.scalers.component
High DPI (4K and above) Swing Support: GUI Components scalers.

  • Uses of BasicScaler in org.vanted.scaling.scalers

    Subclasses of BasicScaler in org.vanted.scaling.scalers
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  NimbusScaler
    It is sufficient enough to rescale only the default font, this fires a property change and Nimbus does the rest alone.
    class  WindowsScaler
    Similar to the default scaler.

  • Uses of BasicScaler in org.vanted.scaling.scalers.component

    Subclasses of BasicScaler in org.vanted.scaling.scalers.component
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractButtonScaler
    An AbstractButton-specific extension of ComponentScaler.
    class  ComponentScaler
    Applicable to initiated Swing Components.
    class  JLabelScaler
    A JLabel-specific extension of ComponentScaler.
    class  JOptionPaneScaler
    A JOptionPane-specific extension of ComponentScaler.
    class  JSplitPaneScaler
    A JSplitPane-specific extension of ComponentScaler.
    class  JTabbedPaneScaler
    A JTabbedPane-specific extension of ComponentScaler.
    class  JTextComponentScaler
    A JTextComponent-specific extension of ComponentScaler.
    class  WindowScaler
    Extension of ComponentScaler, responsible for Window-derived components' decorations scaling.
